parameter.name: edu.usu.cs.mas.managedisaster.coalitionstarter
parameter.desc: what is the starting point of initiating coalitions (Best performance agents [agents] or Fire Stations)

parameter.name: edu.usu.cs.mas.managedisaster.coalition.utility
parameter.desc: Use the algorithm to calculate the utility of each coalition: ATV, NECTAR

parameter.name: edu.usu.cs.mas.managedisaster.plot.enable
parameter.desc: Use the algorithm to calculate the utility of each coalition: ATV, NECTAR

parameter.name: edu.usu.cs.mas.managedisaster.agentid.enable
parameter.desc: Whether or not display the agent id the simulation

parameter.name: edu.usu.cs.mas.managedisaster.dataculler.enable
parameter.desc: Whether or not store information agent, coalition and burning forest
